title: Static Caravans
description: Explore our comfortable static caravans for hire at Lamb Cottage Caravan Park in Vale Royal, Cheshire

hero.title: Static Caravans
hero.subtitle: Comfortable and convenient static caravan options in the heart of Cheshire

introduction.title: Your Home Away From Home
introduction.content: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience with our static caravan options. Whether you're looking for a seasonal pitch, annual agreement, or purchase opportunity, we have the perfect solution for your holiday home needs.

options.name: Seasonal Pitch
options.description: Perfect for regular visitors who want their own space throughout the season. Store your caravan with us and enjoy hassle-free holidays.

options.name: Annual Agreement
options.description: Year-round access to your static caravan with the flexibility to visit whenever you want. Perfect for weekend getaways and extended holidays.

options.name: Purchase Option
options.description: Own your own static caravan on our beautiful site. Full ownership with all the benefits of our premium location and facilities.

benefits.title: Premium Locations
benefits.description: Choose from our selection of prime pitches across our beautiful 7.5-acre site

benefits.title: All Facilities Included
benefits.description: Full access to our luxury amenities, WiFi, and beautifully maintained grounds

benefits.title: Flexible Options
benefits.description: Seasonal pitches, annual agreements, or purchase opportunities available

specifications.title: What's Included
items: Fully serviced pitches with electric, water, and drainage
Access to luxury shower and toilet facilities
Convenient location near Chester and local attractions

pricing.title: Competitive Pricing
pricing.description: We offer competitive rates for all our static caravan options. Contact us for current pricing and availability.
pricing.note: Prices vary by pitch location, caravan size, and agreement type. Special rates available for long-term commitments.
